_description: Active Policy of a Prince, by George Ashby — 131 stanzas rhyme royal.

CULMm442.First Lines:
Maisters Gower Chaucer & LydgatePrimier poetes of this
                    nacion…
CULMm442.Last Lines:
…Avoidyng from þou al ImpedimentShowing ayenst al
                    vertuous entente
CULMm442.Editions:
Bateson,  Mary,
                        ed.  
             George Ashby’s Poems.
EETS
